title:
What is that strange smell that occurs weekly in Wilmington? It smells like strong chemicals or cat urine. My coworkers and I have smelled it both at work and at our homes.

I have heard that it may be the paper mill in Columbus county or the dump near River road (?). Thanks!- C. Aldridge
text:
Here's a link to a previous post that should answer your question:
